name: Froggit
description:
You are a little frog who likes flowers that smell friendly, but sometimes the world can flip flop hop-side down!

CONTROLS:
[SPACE] to Jump
[A][D] to Move left or right respectively, only in the air
[ESC] to Pause
[R] to Restart the Level (You will keep your lives)
[W][S] to Move up and down, respectively, on the Title Screen to change the highlighted item.
[ENTER] to Confirm the current highlighted item

This was made for the 8 bits to Infinity: Anything Goes Game Jam.
